column1: join-2-small-large [JOIN of a small and a large predicate]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s dcterms:alternative ?o1 . ?s rdf:type ?o2 }

column1: join-2-large-small [JOIN of a large and a small predicate]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s rdf:type ?o1 . ?s dcterms:alternative ?o2 }

column1: join-2-large-large [JOIN of two large predicates]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s rdf:type ?o1 . ?s sio:SIO_000300 ?o2 }

column1: join-2-largest-result [JOIN of two predicates with the largest possible result]
column2: PREFIX cito: <http://purl.org/spar/cito/> PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s sio:SIO_000008 ?o1 . ?s cito:isDiscussedBy ?o2 }

column1: join-2-large-large-with-large-result [JOIN of two large predicates with a reasonably large result]
column2: PREFIX cito: <http://purl.org/spar/cito/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s cito:isDiscussedBy ?o1 . ?s rdfs:seeAlso ?o2 }

column1: join-2-large-large-with-small-result [JOIN of two large predicates with a small result]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s sio:SIO_000008 ?o1 . ?s rdf:type ?o2 }

column1: join-3-star-largest-sum-of-join-sizes [JOIN star of three large predicates with the largest sum of join sizes]
column2: PREFIX cito: <http://purl.org/spar/cito/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s dcterms:identifier ?o1 . ?s cito:isDiscussedBy ?o2 . ?s rdf:type ?o3 . }

column1: join-3-chain-largest-sum-of-join-sizes [JOIN chain of three large predicates with the largest sum of join sizes]
column2: PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?a sio:CHEMINF_000477 ?b . ?b sio:SIO_000008 ?c . ?c sio:SIO_000300 ?d . }

column1: join-xlarge-star-on-small-predicates [JOIN star of many small predicates]
column2: PREFIX obo: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s dcterms:alternative ?o0 . ?s owl:disjointWith ?o1 . ?s obo:NCIT_P171 ?o2 . ?s obo:NCIT_A38 ?o3 . ?s obo:NCIT_A39 ?o4 . ?s obo:NCIT_P302 ?o5 . ?s obo:NCIT_A48 ?o6 . ?s obo:NCIT_A37 ?o7 . ?s owl:cardinality ?o8 . ?s obo:NCIT_A29 ?o9 . ?s obo:NCIT_A42 ?o10 . ?s obo:NCIT_P204 ?o11 . ?s obo:NCIT_A28 ?o12 . ?s obo:NCIT_A17 ?o13 . ?s obo:NCIT_A26 ?o14 . ?s owl:unionOf ?o15 . ?s obo:NCIT_A18 ?o16 . ?s obo:NCIT_A24 ?o17 . ?s owl:oneOf ?o18 . ?s obo:NCIT_A19 ?o19 . ?s obo:NCIT_A20 ?o20 . ?s obo:IAO_0000116 ?o21 . ?s obo:OBI_9991118 ?o22 . ?s obo:NCIT_A22 ?o23 . ?s obo:NCIT_A21 ?o24 . }

column1: join-xlarge-chain-on-small-predicates [JOIN chain of many small predicates]
column2: PREFIX obo: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?v0 dcterms:alternative ?v1 . ?v1 owl:disjointWith ?v2 . ?v2 obo:NCIT_P171 ?v3 . ?v3 obo:NCIT_A38 ?v4 . ?v4 obo:NCIT_A39 ?v5 . ?v5 obo:NCIT_P302 ?v6 . ?v6 obo:NCIT_A48 ?v7 . ?v7 obo:NCIT_A37 ?v8 . ?v8 owl:cardinality ?v9 . ?v9 obo:NCIT_A29 ?v10 . ?v10 obo:NCIT_A42 ?v11 . ?v11 obo:NCIT_P204 ?v12 . ?v12 obo:NCIT_A28 ?v13 . ?v13 obo:NCIT_A17 ?v14 . ?v14 obo:NCIT_A26 ?v15 . ?v15 owl:unionOf ?v16 . ?v16 obo:NCIT_A18 ?v17 . ?v17 obo:NCIT_A24 ?v18 . ?v18 owl:oneOf ?v19 . ?v19 obo:NCIT_A19 ?v20 . ?v20 obo:NCIT_A20 ?v21 . ?v21 obo:IAO_0000116 ?v22 . ?v22 obo:OBI_9991118 ?v23 . ?v23 obo:NCIT_A22 ?v24 . ?v24 obo:NCIT_A21 ?v25 . }

column1: optional-join-small-large [OPTIONAL JOIN of a small and a large predicate]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s dcterms:alternative ?o1 OPTIONAL { ?s rdf:type ?o2 } }

column1: optional-join-large-small [OPTIONAL JOIN of a large and a small predicate]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s rdf:type ?o1 OPTIONAL { ?s dcterms:alternative ?o2 } }

column1: optional-join-large-large [OPTIONAL JOIN of two large predicates]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s rdf:type ?o1 OPTIONAL { ?s sio:SIO_000300 ?o2 } }

column1: optional-join-2-large-large-with-large-result [OPTIONAL JOIN of two large predicates with a reasonably large join result]
column2: PREFIX cito: <http://purl.org/spar/cito/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s cito:isDiscussedBy ?o1 . OPTIONAL { ?s rdfs:seeAlso ?o2 } }

column1: optional-join-2-large-large-with-small-join-result-1 [OPTIONAL JOIN of two large predicates with a small join result]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s sio:SIO_000008 ?o1 . OPTIONAL { ?s rdf:type ?o2 } }

column1: optional-join-2-large-large-with-small-join-result-2 [OPTIONAL JOIN of two large predicates with a small join result]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s rdf:type ?o1 . OPTIONAL { ?s sio:SIO_000008 ?o2 } }

column1: optional-join-3-star-1 [OPTIONAL JOIN star of three large predicates with the largest sum of join sizes]
column2: PREFIX cito: <http://purl.org/spar/cito/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s dcterms:identifier ?o1 . ?s cito:isDiscussedBy ?o2 . OPTIONAL { ?s rdf:type ?o3 . } }

column1: optional-join-3-star-2 [OPTIONAL JOIN star of three large predicates with the largest sum of join sizes]
column2: PREFIX cito: <http://purl.org/spar/cito/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s dcterms:identifier ?o1 . OPTIONAL { ?s cito:isDiscussedBy ?o2 . ?s rdf:type ?o3 . } }

column1: optional-join-3-chain-1 [OPTIONAL JOIN chain of three large predicates with the largest sum of join sizes]
column2: PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?a sio:CHEMINF_000477 ?b . ?b sio:SIO_000008 ?c . OPTIONAL { ?c sio:SIO_000300 ?d . } }

column1: optional-join-3-chain-2 [OPTIONAL JOIN chain of three large predicates with the largest sum of join sizes]
column2: PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?a sio:CHEMINF_000477 ?b . OPTIONAL { ?b sio:SIO_000008 ?c . ?c sio:SIO_000300 ?d . } }

column1: minus-join-small-large [MINUS JOIN of a small and a large predicate]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s dcterms:alternative ?o1 MINUS { ?s rdf:type ?o2 } }

column1: minus-join-large-small [MINUS JOIN of a large and a small predicate]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s rdf:type ?o1 MINUS { ?s dcterms:alternative ?o2 } }

column1: minus-join-large-large [MINUS JOIN of two large predicates]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s rdf:type ?o1 MINUS { ?s sio:SIO_000300 ?o2 } }

column1: minus-join-2-large-large-with-large-result [MINUS JOIN of two large predicates with a reasonably large join result]
column2: PREFIX cito: <http://purl.org/spar/cito/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s cito:isDiscussedBy ?o1 . MINUS { ?s rdfs:seeAlso ?o2 } }

column1: minus-join-2-large-large-with-small-join-result-1 [MINUS JOIN of two large predicates with a small join result]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s sio:SIO_000008 ?o1 . MINUS { ?s rdf:type ?o2 } }

column1: minus-join-2-large-large-with-small-join-result-2 [MINUS JOIN of two large predicates with a small join result]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s rdf:type ?o1 . MINUS { ?s sio:SIO_000008 ?o2 } }

column1: minus-join-3-star-1 [MINUS JOIN star of three large predicates with the largest sum of join sizes]
column2: PREFIX cito: <http://purl.org/spar/cito/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s dcterms:identifier ?o1 . ?s cito:isDiscussedBy ?o2 . MINUS { ?s rdf:type ?o3 . } }

column1: minus-join-3-star-2 [MINUS JOIN star of three large predicates with the largest sum of join sizes]
column2: PREFIX cito: <http://purl.org/spar/cito/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s dcterms:identifier ?o1 . MINUS { ?s cito:isDiscussedBy ?o2 . ?s rdf:type ?o3 . } }

column1: minus-join-3-chain-1 [MINUS JOIN chain of three large predicates with the largest sum of join sizes]
column2: PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?a sio:CHEMINF_000477 ?b . ?b sio:SIO_000008 ?c . MINUS { ?c sio:SIO_000300 ?d . } }

column1: minus-join-3-chain-2 [MINUS JOIN chain of three large predicates with the largest sum of join sizes]
column2: PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?a sio:CHEMINF_000477 ?b . MINUS { ?b sio:SIO_000008 ?c . ?c sio:SIO_000300 ?d . } }

column1: exists-join-small-large [EXISTS JOIN of a small and a large predicate]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s dcterms:alternative ?o1 FILTER EXISTS { ?s rdf:type ?o2 } }

column1: exists-join-large-small [EXISTS JOIN of a large and a small predicate]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s rdf:type ?o1 FILTER EXISTS { ?s dcterms:alternative ?o2 } }

column1: exists-join-large-large [EXISTS JOIN of two large predicates]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s rdf:type ?o1 FILTER EXISTS { ?s sio:SIO_000300 ?o2 } }

column1: exists-join-2-large-large-with-large-result [EXISTS JOIN of two large predicates with a reasonably large join result]
column2: PREFIX cito: <http://purl.org/spar/cito/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s cito:isDiscussedBy ?o1 . FILTER EXISTS { ?s rdfs:seeAlso ?o2 } }

column1: exists-join-2-large-large-with-small-join-result-1 [EXISTS JOIN of two large predicates with a small join result]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s sio:SIO_000008 ?o1 . FILTER EXISTS { ?s rdf:type ?o2 } }

column1: exists-join-2-large-large-with-small-join-result-2 [EXISTS JOIN of two large predicates with a small join result]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s rdf:type ?o1 . FILTER EXISTS { ?s sio:SIO_000008 ?o2 } }

column1: exists-join-3-star-1 [EXISTS JOIN star of three large predicates with the largest sum of join sizes]
column2: PREFIX cito: <http://purl.org/spar/cito/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s dcterms:identifier ?o1 . ?s cito:isDiscussedBy ?o2 . FILTER EXISTS { ?s rdf:type ?o3 . } }

column1: exists-join-3-star-2 [EXISTS JOIN star of three large predicates with the largest sum of join sizes]
column2: PREFIX cito: <http://purl.org/spar/cito/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s dcterms:identifier ?o1 . FILTER EXISTS { ?s cito:isDiscussedBy ?o2 . ?s rdf:type ?o3 . } }

column1: exists-join-3-chain-1 [EXISTS JOIN chain of three large predicates with the largest sum of join sizes]
column2: PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?a sio:CHEMINF_000477 ?b . ?b sio:SIO_000008 ?c . FILTER EXISTS { ?c sio:SIO_000300 ?d . } }

column1: exists-join-3-chain-2 [EXISTS JOIN chain of three large predicates with the largest sum of join sizes]
column2: PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?a sio:CHEMINF_000477 ?b . FILTER EXISTS { ?b sio:SIO_000008 ?c . ?c sio:SIO_000300 ?d . } }

column1: union-no-constraint [UNION of two large predicates, no constraint]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { { ?s rdf:type ?o } UNION { ?s sio:SIO_000300 ?o } }

column1: union-constraint-from-star [UNION of two large predicates, constrained by a large predicate known to have join partners]
column2: PREFIX cito: <http://purl.org/spar/cito/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { { ?s dcterms:identifier ?o1 } UNION { ?s cito:isDiscussedBy ?o1 } ?s rdf:type ?o2 }

column1: union-constraint-small-join [UNION of two large predicates, constrained by a join with a small result]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX vocab: <http://rdf.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubchem/vocabulary#> PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { { ?s sio:SIO_000008 ?o1 } UNION { ?s vocab:priorityDate ?o1 } ?s rdf:type ?o2 }

column1: union-constraint-large-join [UNION of two large predicates, constrained by a join with a large result]
column2: PREFIX cito: <http://purl.org/spar/cito/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { { ?s cito:isDiscussedBy ?o1 } UNION { ?s sio:CHEMINF_000477 ?o1 } ?s rdfs:seeAlso ?o2 }

column1: union-constraint-filter-restrictive [UNION of two large predicates, constraint by restrictive FILTER]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { { ?s rdf:type ?o } UNION { ?s sio:SIO_000300 ?o } FILTER (?s = ?o) }

column1: multicolumn-join-small [Multicolumn JOIN small]
column2: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s rdfs:label ?o . ?s sio:SIO_000300 ?o }

column1: multicolumn-join-large [Multicolumn JOIN large]
column2: PREFIX fabio: <http://purl.org/spar/fabio/> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s fabio:hasSubjectTerm ?o . ?s fabio:hasPrimarySubjectTerm ?o }

column1: group-by-count-object-high-multiplicity [GROUP BY with COUNT, for object with high multiplicity]
column2: PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT ?object (COUNT(?subject) AS ?count) { ?subject sio:SIO_000221 ?object . } GROUP BY ?object ORDER BY DESC(?count) LIMIT 10

column1: group-by-count-object-low-multiplicity [GROUP BY with COUNT, for object with low multiplicity]
column2: PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT ?object (COUNT(?subject) AS ?count) { ?subject sio:SIO_000008 ?object . } GROUP BY ?object ORDER BY DESC(?count) LIMIT 10

column1: group-by-count-object-wrong-sort-order [GROUP BY with COUNT, for object but not sorted by object]
column2: PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT ?o1 (COUNT(?s) AS ?count) { ?s sio:SIO_000221 ?o1 . ?s sio:SIO_000300 ?o2 . } GROUP BY ?o1 ORDER BY DESC(?count) LIMIT 10

column1: group-by-complex-aggregate [GROUP BY with COUNT and MIN and MAX and SAMPLE]
column2: PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT ?o1 (COUNT(?s) AS ?count) (MIN(?s) AS ?min) (MAX(?s) AS ?max) (SAMPLE(?s) AS ?sample) { ?s sio:SIO_000221 ?o1 . ?s sio:SIO_000300 ?o2 . } GROUP BY ?o1 ORDER BY DESC(?count) LIMIT 10

column1: group-by-implicit-numeric-baseline [Implicit GROUP BY with COUNT on numeric predicate as baseline]
column2: SELECT (COUNT(?o) AS ?count) { ?s <http://data.epo.org/linked-data/def/cpc/level> ?o. }

column1: group-by-implicit-numeric-sum [Implicit GROUP BY with SUM on numeric predicate]
column2: SELECT (SUM(?o) AS ?sum) { ?s <http://data.epo.org/linked-data/def/cpc/level> ?o. }

column1: group-by-implicit-numeric-min [Implicit GROUP BY with MIN on numeric predicate]
column2: SELECT (MIN(?o) AS ?min) { ?s <http://data.epo.org/linked-data/def/cpc/level> ?o. }

column1: group-by-implicit-numeric-max [Implicit GROUP BY with MAX on numeric predicate]
column2: SELECT (MAX(?o) AS ?max) { ?s <http://data.epo.org/linked-data/def/cpc/level> ?o. }

column1: group-by-implicit-numeric-avg [Implicit GROUP BY with AVG on numeric predicate]
column2: SELECT (AVG(?o) AS ?avg) { ?s <http://data.epo.org/linked-data/def/cpc/level> ?o. }

column1: group-by-implicit-string-baseline [Implicit GROUP BY with COUNT on string predicate as baseline]
column2: PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(?o) AS ?count) { ?s sio:SIO_000300 ?o. }

column1: group-by-implicit-string-min [Implicit GROUP BY with MIN on string predicate]
column2: PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (MIN(?o) AS ?min) { ?s sio:SIO_000300 ?o. }

column1: group-by-implicit-string-max [Implicit GROUP BY with MAX on string predicate]
column2: PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (MAX(?o) AS ?max) { ?s sio:SIO_000300 ?o. }

column1: group-by-string-groupconcat [GROUP BY with GROUP_CONCAT on string predicate with high subject multiplicity]
column2: PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (SUM(STRLEN(?cat)) AS ?sum) { { SELECT (GROUP_CONCAT(?o; SEPARATOR=" ") AS ?cat) { ?s sio:SIO_000300 ?o. } GROUP BY ?s } }

column1: distinct-count-object-high-multiplicity [COUNT DISTINCT, for object with high multiplicity]
column2: PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?object) AS ?count) { ?subject sio:SIO_000221 ?object . }

column1: distinct-count-object-low-multiplicity [COUNT DISTINCT, for object with low multiplicity]
column2: PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?object) AS ?count) { ?subject sio:SIO_000008 ?object . }

column1: distinct-count-object-wrong-sort-order [COUNT DISTINCT, for object but not sorted by object]
column2: PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?o1) AS ?count) { ?s sio:SIO_000221 ?o1 . ?s sio:SIO_000300 ?o2 . }

column1: transitive-path-plus [Transitive path with plus]
column2: PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) { ?s skos:related+ ?o }

column1: transitive-path-plus-fixed-subject [Transitive path with plus and a fixed subject]
column2: PREFIX pathway: <http://rdf.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubchem/pathway/> PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) { pathway:PWID39807 skos:related+ ?o }

column1: regex-3-contains [CONTAINS filter with fixed string of length 3]
column2: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s rdfs:label ?o FILTER CONTAINS(?o, "com") }

column1: regex-3-fixed [REGEX filter with fixed string of length 3]
column2: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s rdfs:label ?o FILTER REGEX(?o, "com") }

column1: regex-3 [REGEX filter with expression of length 3]
column2: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s rdfs:label ?o FILTER REGEX(?o, "c.m") }

column1: regex-prefix-1 [REGEX filter with prefix of length 1]
column2: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s rdfs:label ?o FILTER REGEX(?o, "^C") }

column1: regex-prefix-2 [REGEX filter with prefix of length 2]
column2: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s rdfs:label ?object FILTER REGEX(?object, "^Co") }

column1: regex-prefix-3 [REGEX filter with prefix of length 3]
column2: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT (COUNT(*) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s rdfs:label ?object FILTER REGEX(?object, "^Com") }

column1: strlen [String length for large string predicate]
column2: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT (SUM(STRLEN(?o)) AS ?checksum) { ?s rdfs:label ?o . }

column1: strbefore [STRBEFORE string function]
column2: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT (SUM(STRLEN(STRBEFORE(?o, "a"))) AS ?checksum) { ?s rdfs:label ?o . }

column1: strafter [STRAFTER string function]
column2: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT (SUM(STRLEN(STRAFTER(?o, "a"))) AS ?checksum) { ?s rdfs:label ?o . }

column1: strstarts [STRSTARTS string function]
column2: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT (SUM(xsd:integer(STRSTARTS(?o, "a"))) AS ?count) { ?s rdfs:label ?o . }

column1: strends [STRENDS string function]
column2: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT (SUM(xsd:integer(STRENDS(?o, "a"))) AS ?count) { ?s rdfs:label ?o . }

column1: result-size-tiny [Export 10 tuples]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT ?s ?o WHERE { ?s rdf:type ?o } LIMIT 10

column1: result-size-small [Export 1000 tuples]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT ?s ?o WHERE { ?s rdf:type ?o } LIMIT 1000

column1: result-size-medium [Export 100K tuples]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT ?s ?o WHERE { ?s rdf:type ?o } LIMIT 100000

column1: result-size-large [Export 1M tuples]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT ?s ?o WHERE { ?s rdf:type ?o } LIMIT 1000000

column1: result-size-xlarge [Export 10M tuples]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT ?s ?o WHERE { ?s rdf:type ?o } LIMIT 10000000

column1: numeric-baseline [Baseline for numeric queries]
column2: SELECT (SUM(?o) AS ?sum) WHERE { ?s <http://data.epo.org/linked-data/def/cpc/level> ?o }

column1: numeric-abs [ABS function]
column2: SELECT (SUM(ABS(?o)) AS ?sum) WHERE { ?s <http://data.epo.org/linked-data/def/cpc/level> ?o }

column1: numeric-ceil [CEIL function]
column2: SELECT (SUM(CEIL(?o)) AS ?sum) WHERE { ?s <http://data.epo.org/linked-data/def/cpc/level> ?o }

column1: numeric-floor [FLOOR function]
column2: SELECT (SUM(FLOOR(?o)) AS ?sum) WHERE { ?s <http://data.epo.org/linked-data/def/cpc/level> ?o }

column1: numeric-round [ROUND function]
column2: SELECT (SUM(ROUND(?o)) AS ?sum) WHERE { ?s <http://data.epo.org/linked-data/def/cpc/level> ?o }

column1: numeric-add [Addition]
column2: SELECT (SUM(?o + ?o) AS ?sum) WHERE { ?s <http://data.epo.org/linked-data/def/cpc/level> ?o }

column1: numeric-greater [Greater than]
column2: SELECT (SUM(?o > 0) AS ?sum) WHERE { ?s <http://data.epo.org/linked-data/def/cpc/level> ?o }

column1: numeric-filter-bin-search-fifty-fifty [Numeric FILTER that filters out 50 percent of the values]
column2: SELECT (COUNT(?s) AS ?count) { ?s <http://data.epo.org/linked-data/def/cpc/level> ?o . FILTER (?o >= 10) }

column1: numeric-filter-bin-search-seventy-thirty [Numeric FILTER that filters out 70 percent of the values]
column2: SELECT (COUNT(?s) AS ?count) { ?s <http://data.epo.org/linked-data/def/cpc/level> ?o . FILTER (?o >= 10) }

column1: numeric-filter-bin-search-ninetyfive-five [Numeric FILTER that filters out 95 percent of the values]
column2: SELECT (COUNT(?s) AS ?count) { ?s <http://data.epo.org/linked-data/def/cpc/level> ?o . FILTER (?o >= 13) }

column1: filter-few-results [FILTER that filters out most rows and has few results]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT (COUNT(?s) AS ?count) { ?s rdf:type ?o . FILTER (?s = ?o) }

column1: filter-many-results [FILTER that filters out few rows and has many results]
column2: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT (COUNT(?s) AS ?count) { ?s rdf:type ?o . FILTER (?s != ?o) }

column1: filter-language-en [FILTER on string predicate for only English literals]
column2: PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(?s) AS ?count) { ?s sio:SIO_000300 ?o . FILTER(LANG(?o) = "en") }

column1: date-year [YEAR function]
column2: PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> SELECT (SUM(YEAR(?o)) AS ?sum) WHERE { ?s dcterms:modified ?o }

column1: date-month [MONTH function]
column2: PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> SELECT (SUM(MONTH(?o)) AS ?sum) WHERE { ?s dcterms:modified ?o }

column1: date-day [DAY function]
column2: PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> SELECT (SUM(DAY(?o)) AS ?sum) WHERE { ?s dcterms:modified ?o }

column1: number-of-triples [Total number of triples]
column2: SELECT (COUNT(?s) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s ?p ?o }

column1: number-of-subjects [Total number of distinct subjects]
column2: SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?s) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s ?p ?o }

column1: number-of-predicates [Total number of distinct predicates]
column2: SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?p) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s ?p ?o }

column1: number-of-objects [Total number of distinct objects]
column2: SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?o) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s ?p ?o }

column1: number-of-literals [Total number of literals]
column2: SELECT (COUNT(?o) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s ?p ?o FILTER ISLITERAL(?o) }

column1: number-of-blank-nodes [Total number of blank nodes]
column2: SELECT (COUNT(?s) AS ?count) WHERE { ?s ?p ?o FILTER ISBLANK(?s) }
